what: a stale data error in case a workflow was updated whilst a different user is editing the old version of the same workflow.
why: to help reduce configuration errors due to multiple people editing the same resource at the same time.

what: button to select all records in a record list and preform the actions edit, delete, un-delete as well as executing workflows.
why: to provide the user with an easier way to edit, delete, un-delete and execute workflows on multiple records.

what: default workflow and trigger action severity to `notice` to keep it consistent with other resources in {APP_NAME_ADMIN}.
why: to make create, update, delete, and undelete actions visible in the default production ruleset of the actionlog.

what: known concurrent map read/write issues for Integration Gateway profiler and workflow pre-processing.
